alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 31 at 2:27AM AKST until January 31 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions occurring. Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Expect whiteout conditions with near zero visibility. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until noon Monday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds gusting to 40 mph are causing whiteout conditions in blowing snow. Significant drifting of the snow is likely. Conditions will slowly improve during the day Monday as winds slowly decrease. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
